Description: NorthBay Solutions is looking for a highly skilled and motivated Lead Full Stack Engineer with solid experience in Web & Mobile Application Development and AWS.Skills
Skills: The ideal candidate is a creative individual who thinks out of the box and would like to work in a diverse technology environment. We are looking for a candidate to bring passion and dedication to this position and must be a great motivator who can thrive in an Agile environment.
The candidate must be required to have experience of over 10 years.

10+ years of hands-on experience with designing & developing web and mobile applications
Hands-on experience of React with Typescript, Amplify, Material UI with React
Hand-on experience with LangChain, Embeddings, Vector Database
The candidate should be expert in Python
Hands-on experience of FastAPI and Rest APIs
Proficient with AWS Services like ECS, Cognito, Cloud Watch, RDS: Postgres, API Gateway, Lambda
Experienced in writing unit tests
Hands-on experience with Docker
Hands-on with Bitbucket and Git
Candidates must have strong communication skills to work with various stakeholders, including customers
Experience with SCRUM-based, Agile software development practices and familiar with Jira
The candidate must be able to manage and mentor a team of engineers
The candidate should be willing to move to onsite (UAE).
Hands-on experience with Flutter for mobile app development and experience in publishing mobile apps to iOS and Android stores would be an added advantage
